attributes.action: Give the people a vote on the Coronavirus pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
By continuing to implement restrictions, the cure is worse than the cause.
Tens of thousands of people will die from non coronavirus illnesses such as Undetected / untreated cancers and mental illness as a result of these restrictions.
Instead of destroying what’s left of the economy, support the old and vulnerable in a lockdown situation (if they so choose to isolate) and allow the rest of the population to build an immunity and the Economy to recover.
Give people the choice, don’t dictate !!!
attributes.background:
Implement a general election style vote on the coronavirus procedures to allow the people a choice as a democratic country

Option 1- allow the government to continue to dictate our freedom and economic destruction.

Option 2- return to normal with a Swedish style approach

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
